section.name: Overview
section.p: Course list is a J2EE web application based on Cyclops Group Tornado project . Vertically the application is separated into three layers ---- UI modules, services and database entities.
Please look at Dependencies to find out the related tools and technologies.

section.name: Roles
section.p:
Three user roles(admin, teacher, student) are defined in the system.
User Password Role Description
admin admin administrator Can do anything in this system
john john student Can see the list, add and drop some courses
tim tim teacher Can force student to add/drop his course
